TypeSignature.Value: protected internal delegate Exception NativeObjectSecurity.ExceptionFromErrorCode(int errorCode, string name, SafeHandle handle, object context);
.class nested protected auto ansi sealed NativeObjectSecurity/ExceptionFromErrorCode extends System.MulticastDelegate
Protected Friend Delegate Function NativeObjectSecurity.ExceptionFromErrorCode(errorCode As Integer, name As String, handle As SafeHandle, context As Object) As Exception
public protected delegate Exception ^ NativeObjectSecurity::ExceptionFromErrorCode(int errorCode, System::String ^ name, SafeHandle ^ handle, System::Object ^ context);

Docs.param: The name of the securable object with which the object is associated.
The handle of the securable object with which the object is associated.
An object that contains contextual information about the source or destination of the exception.
Docs.summary: Provides a way for integrators to map numeric error codes to specific exceptions that they create.
